product_name: PATC Guide to Great North Mountain Trails - Second Edtion
long_description: The Guide to Great North Mountain Trails includes more than 40 trails along the Virginia and West Virginia border in the Lee Ranger District of the George Washington National Forest.
short_description: The Guide to Great North Mountain Trails includes more than 40 trails along the Virginia and West Virginia border in the Lee Ranger District of the George Washington National Forest.
